title: IQ Font - Designed With A Car
content:
I'd recently heard about the 'IQ font' used in the identity of a new car for Toyota. What I didn't know is that the font was actually drawn with the car itself. Check out the video of how it was made. Pretty interesting.

[Video » Designing A Font With A Car](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829114018/http:/drawn.ca/2009/07/27/designing-a-font%E2%80%A6-with-a-car/)

Download the font here, free. [IQ Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829114018/http:/www.iqfont.com/IQFONT.zip)
author: CreativeNRG

comments.content:
cool video.  
got to stick to my pen, though - my office is too small for this kind of design. (and i wonder whether it is environmentally OK?)

thanks for the tip

gerhard
